com.filestack

Class Policy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.filestack.Policy

  • public class Policy
extends java.lang.Object
    Determines what access a user is allowed (if account security is enabled). A policy sets access and a signature validates the policy.
    See Also:
    Filestack Security Docs

      Builds new Policy.
